124b6('dul ba): tu 'dzegs nas slar mchi ba'i bar du re zhig gzhes shig des smras pa/ de na de bzhin gyis shig de steng gi khang thog tu 'dzegs nas chom rkun pa chom rkun pa zhes bya ba sgra phyung ba dang / de 'jigs shing skrag nas bros te rang gi khyim du song nas sgo drung du ral gri bzhag ste chom
124b7('dul ba): rkun pa de ni 'di yin te/ kho bo'i pha bsad nas bros so zhes sgra phyung nas/ des pha'i ro de bkur sti byas te song ngo // sems can sdig pa'i las byas pas ni brtan pa mi rnyed pas de mu stegs can gyi gnas dang dka' thub kyi nags de dang de dag tu song ste dris pa/ shes ldan
125a1('dul ba): dag las ci zhig byas na des sdig pa'i las zad par 'gyur/ de na kha cig na re mer zhugs shig ces zer ro// kha cig na re dug zo shig ces zer ro// kha cig na re g.yang sar mchongs shig ces zer ro// kha cig na re chur mchongs shig ces zer ro//
125a2('dul ba): kha cig na re thag pas 'gegs te shi shig ces zer te/ thams cad kyang shi ba'i thabs ston par byed kyi/ nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ston pa ni 'ga' yang med do// de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / des de na dge slong zhig/ gang gis sdig pa'i
125a3('dul ba): las byas pa/ / dge ba yis ni 'gog byed de// nyi zla sprin nas byung ba ltar// 'jig rten 'dir ni de snang 'gyur// zhes kha ton zer ba thos nas des bsams pa/ sdig pa'i las kyang dgag par nus kyis/ 'di dag gi nang du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/
125a4('dul ba): dge slong gi gan du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo// des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas des shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams te bklag par brtsams so// des klog cing kha ton byed pa na sde snod gsum bklags shing sde
125a5('dul ba): snod gsum dang ldan pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to// de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod brtson 'grus 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/ des smras pa/ sdig pa'i las zad par bya'o// khyod kyis sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas/
125a6('dul ba): pha bsad do ci pha ba'am/ 'on te skyed pha yin/ des smras pa/ skyed pha yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ni gang zag pha bsad pa
125a7('dul ba): bsnyil bar 'os pa yin te/ dge slong dag gang zag pha bsad pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag pha bsad pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o// 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par 'ongs na/ des
125b1('dul ba): de la pha bsad pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/ / ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// des bsams pa/ ci de 'babs par bya'am/ mtha' 'khob cig tu 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ des mtha' 'khob tu song ste khyim bdag cig rjes su
125b2('dul ba): 'jug par byas so/ / des mngon par dad pas de'i phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug ste/ der phyogs dang yul tha dad pa na 'khod pa'i dge slong dag gnas shing de'i gdams ngag gis mang po dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so// de dus gzhan zhig na na
125b3('dul ba): bar gyur nas rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gro byas na nyam dmas pa nyid du gyur nas/ des lhan cig gnas pa rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i phyir dge 'dun la bsro khang gyis shig/ de rnams
125b4('dul ba): kyis de'i phyir bsro khang byas so/ / bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing // mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur// phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste// gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin// zhes bya ba yin pas de shi shing dus la bab nas sems can dmyal ba chen po
125b5('dul ba): mnar med par skyes so/ / de'i lhan cig gnas pa dgra bcom pa zhig gis bdag gi mkhan po gang du skyes zhes sems pa la zhugs nas/ des lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na ma mthong zhing mi dang / dud 'gro dang / rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta
125b6('dul ba): bar brtsams na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes par mthong nas des bsams pa/ mkhan po ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ mang du thos pa/ chos kyi 'khor sdud sdud pa yin na des las ci zhig byas na/ des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par
125b7('dul ba): skyes snyam nas bsams na/ pha bsad pa yin par mthong ngo // de mnar med pa'i 'od zer dag gis phog pa dang smras pa/ kye ma bsro khang 'di me re tsha zhes smras pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i srung mas tho ba blangs te mgor bsnun nas skal chad khyod la bsro khang ga la yod/
126a1('dul ba): 'di ltar 'di ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yin no zhes smras so// de dge ba'i sems kyis dus byas nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye
126a2('dul ba): ste/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis skyes pa'o// des sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang / dge 'dun la bsro khang gi khrus byas pas skyes pa mthong
126a3('dul ba): ngo / / de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag zhag lon par gnas te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag lon par ma gnas
126a4('dul ba): pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te/ do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i ut+pal dang / pad ma
126a5('dul ba): dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste/ kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
126a6('dul ba): bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang / 'di ltar sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag
126a7('dul ba): la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta
126b1('dul ba): bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par mdzad do/ / des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/
126b2('dul ba): lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag
126b3('dul ba): las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / dag nas ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// yang smras
126b4('dul ba): pa/ khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i// ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i// mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur// shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni// de ring skyon bral dag
126b5('dul ba): pa'i mig thob cing / / go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur// 'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po// srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa// thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu
126b6('dul ba): mchis/ / de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas// zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas// dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te// lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song // de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs
126b7('dul ba): rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur gyur te/ cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su
127a1('dul ba): song ngo / / de'i lhan cig gnas pa dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zas kyi gral du 'dug ste de'i lhan cig gnas pa gzhan zhig dge 'dun la chu 'grim par byed do// ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan des chu kha phor du blugs nas sor mo'i rtse mos reg
127a2('dul ba): na shin tu grangs nas des bsams pa/ bdag cag ni chu shin tu grang mo 'di lta bu 'thung na mkhan po ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na zangs khu bskol ba 'thung ngo snyam nas/ des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par rnam par blta bar brtsams na mi snang ngo //
127a3('dul ba): dud 'gro dang / dang / mi dang / sems can dmyal ba gzhan rnams su yang rnam par bltas na de rnams na yang mi snang nas/ lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lhar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das
127a4('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas te/ lha rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mthong nas 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob nas/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/ 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa/
127a5('dul ba): log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// mkhan po gcig pa des de rangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas bdag ni
127a6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas rangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa re zhig khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus ma yin gyis/ dge 'dun gyi nang du dris shig dang / der khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus la
127a7('dul ba): bab par 'gyur ro/ / ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun tshogs shing 'khod pa na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis mkhan po gcig pa de la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis de'i tshe ci smras/ des smras pa/ khyod la kho bos khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas bdag dge
127b1('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas rangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam zhes smras so/ / des skabs de dge 'dun gyi nang du de la rgya cher brjod pa dang de yang yi rangs shing dge slong rnams kyang kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ kye ma chos
127b2('dul ba): kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/ 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa/ log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// // sdom la/ dgra bcom bsad dang dge 'dun dbyen// ngan sems kyis ni khrag phyung dang // pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po
127b3('dul ba): dang / / gnas nas dbyung ba gsum yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ltang brang gi tshal gseb tu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po
127b4('dul ba): lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bkod pa na/ des rang gi yul du dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste/ nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o// gang zhig byed pa na ngas de yul med par bya zhing skyin pa
127b5('dul ba): ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo'o/ / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdo sdes btul ba de'i tshe na des kyang dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste/ nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o// gang zhig byed na de
127b6('dul ba): gsad pa'i gyod la bskrin cing skyin pa ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang / de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang / yul ko sa la'i chom rkun pa gang yin pa de dag sa mtshams kyi bar du dong ste/ 'khod nas yul ma ga d+hA nas don mthun
127b7('dul ba): 'ong ba gang yin pa de yang 'joms par byed do/ / yul ko sa la nas don mthun 'ong ba gang yin pa de yang 'joms par byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na don mthun bsel ba dang bcas pa yul ma ga d+hA nas yul ko sa lar 'phags pa dang / gang gi tshe sa mtshams
128a1('dul ba): kyi bar du phyin pa de'i tshe ded dpon des smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gsal rgyal de ni gdug pa pha rol gnon pa yin pas bdag cag la skyin pa sbyin du 'jug nus pa yin na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir bsel ba la gla sbyin par bya/ 'di dag
128a2('dul ba): nyid nas phyir bzlog go zhes de dag phyir bzlog ste don mthun de tshogs nyung ngur chas pa dang / chom rkun de dag gis kyang bya ma rta btsugs te bsdad pa dang / des de mthong nas shes ldan dag don mthun tshogs nyung ngus 'ongs na ci'i phyir btang snyoms su 'khod ces smras pa dang /
128a3('dul ba): de nas chom rkun pa de dag gis der tshong pa kha cig ni srog dang phral lo// kha cig ni zong bor te bros so// dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas dgra bcom pa don mthun de dang 'gro ba zhig kyang srog dang phral lo// de na don mthun gang dag bros pa
128a4('dul ba): de dag mgo dang lus rdul gyis yog ste klad pa'i skra yogs nas ku co 'don cing ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du phyin nas thal mo sbyar te smras pa/ lha khyod kyi yul du bdag cag tshong bar mi rung bar rnam par bzhag go// ci zhig byas/ bdag cag chom rkun pa dag gis
128a5('dul ba): bcom mo/ / phyogs gang du/ ga ge mo zhig tu'o// rgyal pos dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba/ rkun rdzas dang chom rkun pa dag myur du khug shig/ des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsgo nas phyir byung ba dang chom rkun pa de dag kyang go cha phud nas bag yangs
128a6('dul ba): su sA la'i dgon pa zhig na rkun rdzas bged cing 'khod pa las/ dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos de dag phyogs bzhir bskor nas dbus su dung dang / rnga pa Ta ha'i sgra dag gis skrag par byas pa dang / de rnams las kha cig ni rkun rdzas bor te bros so// kha cig ni bsad do//
128a7('dul ba): drug bcu ni gson por bzung ste des rkun rdzas de yang khyer nas rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha chom rkun pa dag ni 'di dag lags so// rkun rdzas ni 'di dag lags so// de nas rgyal pos de rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis rgyal pos dril bsgrags pa
128b1('dul ba): byed du bcug ste/ nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o// gang zhig byed na de gsad pa'i gyod la bskrin cing skyin pa ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang / bang ba nas sbyin no zhes ma thos sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha thos so// 'o na ci'i phyir tshong pa dag bcom/ lha 'tsho ba
128b2('dul ba): ma mchis so/ / ci'i phyir srog dang phral/ 'jigs pa nye bar bstan pa'i slad du'o// khyod kyis 'jigs pa de 'dra ba nye bar bstan pa dang / da sngon sus kyang ma mthong ba gang yin pa'i 'jigs pa de 'dra ba nye bar bstan par bya'o// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo
128b3('dul ba): ba/ shes ldan dag deng la 'di dag thams cad sod cig/ de dag gis lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su rjes su sgrogs shing gsad par khrid pa na chom rkun pa zhig lam dog par bros te rgyal byed kyi tshal du dge slong gi gan du song ste smras
128b4('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo// des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so// chom rkun pa de dag kyang bsad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rang gi rgud pa dang / gzhan gyi rgud pa dang / rang gi 'byor pa dang / gzhan gyi
128b5('dul ba): 'byor pa la yang dang yang du so sor rtogs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag rang gi rgud pa dang / gzhan gyi rgud pa ni kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yin la/ rang gi 'byor pa dang / gzhan gyi 'byor ba yang kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro// zhes
128b6('dul ba): gsungs pas ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rnams dur khrod rgyur 'dong ba na dge slong de yang de rnams dang lhan cig dur khrod rgyur song ba las des chom rkun pa de dag bsad pa mthong nas mchi mas brnangs te 'dug par gyur pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag
128b7('dul ba): 'di gsar du rab tu byung ba yin yang bsam pa 'di 'dra bar bzang ngo / / des skad phyung ste ngu bar brtsams pa dang dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci'i phyir cho nges 'debs/ des smras pa/ 'di ni bdag gi pha'o// 'di ni bdag gi phu nu'o// 'di ni khu bo'o// 'di
129a1('dul ba): ni zhang po'o/ / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di rnams kyis dgra bcom pa srog dang phral lam/ des smras pa/ phral lo zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
129a2('dul ba): dag gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa bsad pa yin te/ gang zag dgra bcom pa bsad pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag dgra bcom pa bsad pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o// 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung
129a3('dul ba): bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la dgra bcom pa bsad pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o// ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/
129a4('dul ba): btsun pa gang gis sngon rab tu phyung ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye ba de gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/ rab tu dbyung bar bgyi 'am rab tu dbyung bar mi bgyi/
129a5('dul ba): nye ba 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu dbyung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o// ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs
129a6('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/
129a7('dul ba): rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'am/ rab tu dbyung bar mi bgyi/ nye ba 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu dbyung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o// ma dris
129b1('dul ba): par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon gang rab tu 'byung ba na pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba byung ba de gal te legs par gsungs pa'i
129b2('dul ba): chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/ rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'am/ rab tu dbyung bar mi bgyi/ nye ba 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dong ba 'ongs na/
129b3('dul ba): des de la pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba byung ba ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o// ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
129b4('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te gang zag ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba babs pa zhig yang phyir 'ongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba mthong gis bdag rab tu dbyung bar gsol zhes
129b5('dul ba): zer na de rab tu dbyung bar bya'o/ / rab tu phyung nas tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba bshags par byas/ bdag bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol zhes zer na bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o// ji ste bsnyen par rdzogs nas ltung ba ma mthong ngo zhes zer na/ gal te dge 'dun
129b6('dul ba): tshogs pa yod na yang ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o/ / gal te tshogs pa med la ji ste bsnyen par rdzogs na legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin te/ 'di ltar gang zag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs
129b7('dul ba): pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ / ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi 'chos pas gnas nas phyung ba dang / sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas phyung ba yang de bzhin no// // sdom la/ lag
130a1('dul ba): rdum dag dang rkang rdum dang / / lag sor zlum por 'jas pa dang // mchu med lus la rma mtshan can// rgan ches pa dang gzhon ches dang // theng po smad 'char zhar ba dang // lag sor rdum sgur mi'u thung dang // lba ba lkugs pa 'on pa dang // rten
130a2('dul ba): 'phye dang ni rkang 'bam dang / / bud med kyis dub khur gyis dub// mi gang lam gyis dub rnams dang // ya za ma lug gta' gam dang // de lta bu yi mi rnams ni// drang srong chen pos dgag pa mdzad// mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang // yongs su dag pa bsnyen rdzogs
130a3('dul ba): par/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab mkhyen te// bden pa'i mtshan gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni gang rab tu byung ba dang
130a4('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa des ji srid du 'di dag ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag yin no zhes bya bar mi shes pa de srid du de de dag dang lhan cig gnas par byed la/ gang gi tshe shes par gyur pa de'i tshe dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par byed de/
130a5('dul ba): ston pa'i bka' lung gis dus gsum du 'gro ba'i phyir blta ba 'ba' zhig byed do// de nas de dag gis gros bya bar brtsams pa/ dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni btsas 'phrog pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag cag gis rab tu phyung ba rnams 'di dag gis 'phrog
130a6('dul ba): par byed kyis/ da ni lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis dbrog par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de 'dra ba rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes gros byas so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nye dga' kun du 'khyam pas mi lag rdum zhig mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin ci'i phyir rab tu mi
130a7('dul ba): 'byung / des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag lag pa ma tshang ba su zhig gis rab tu 'byin par bgyid/ nye smras pa/ bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la thugs rjes rab tu phye ba yin gyis/ kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes des de rab tu phyung
130b1('dul ba): zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/ / de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum zhig kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams bslabs nas smras pa/ bzhin kyis mi sos/ mnyan yod rgya che la rang gi spyod yul dang yab kyi spyod yul yin pas bsod snyoms rgyus
130b2('dul ba): la 'tsho bar gyis shig/ des smras pa/ mkhan po ji ltar bsod snyoms rgyu bar bgyi/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis de tsam yang mi shes sam/ ngas khyod la bstan par bya'o zhes des de'i sham thabs ni srad bus bcings/ chos gos ni tsher mas gtur te bskon/ dpung
130b3('dul ba): pa g.yon par ni lhung bzed kyi snod bzhag/ dpung pa g.yas par ni khar gsil btags so// de nas de mnyan yod du spyod yul du zhugs pa dang bud med kyis brang brdungs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sus khyod rab tu byung ba'i lag pa gnyis bcad/ des smras pa/ sring mo
130b4('dul ba): khyim pa nas kho bo'i lag pa chad de/ rab tu byung nas chad pa ma yin no// sus rab tu phyung / des smras pa/ mkhan po nye so// de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa de ma gtogs pas gzhan su zhig 'di lta bu rab tu 'byin par byed ces zer
130b5('dul ba): ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag lag rdum rab tu 'byin pa las gyur pa yin no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge
130b6('dul ba): slong gis lag rdum rab tu dbyung bar mi bya bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o/ / rab tu 'byin par byed/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// lag rdum ji lta ba de bzhin du rkang rdum dang / lag sor zlum por 'jas pa dang / mchu med pa dang / lus
130b7('dul ba): la rma mtshan can dang / rgan ches pa dag kyang de bzhin no// dge slong dag gzhon ches pa dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas de dag gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal bshang gcis ma rung bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o//
131a1('dul ba): theng po dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// smad 'chal dang / zhar ba dang / lag sor rdum po dang / sgur po dang / mi'u thung dang / lba ba can dang / lkugs pa dang /
131a2('dul ba): 'on pa dang / rten 'phye dang / rkang 'bam dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong dag bud med kyis dub pa dang / khur
131a3('dul ba): gyis dub pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / ya za ma lug dang / gta' gam ba dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bsdu
131a4('dul ba): bar bya ba'i skabs so/ / rab tu 'byung ba'i gzhi rdzogs // // gso sbyong gi gzhi'i sdom la/ mu stegs can dang ka bi na// gnas dang rgyal po sbyar ba mang // sdom la/ mu stegs can dang gsol ba dang // gnang ba dang ni 'dug pa dang // bab
131a5('dul ba): col spong dang zhal ta dang / / bya dang gso sbyong gnas rnams so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag nang par nang par zhing bcom ldan 'das la
131a6('dul ba): blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar brtson par gyur to// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyang nang du yang dag par 'jog par mdzad la/ dge slong yid du 'thad pa rnams kyang nang du yang
131a7('dul ba): dag 'jog par byed pas bdag cag re zhig bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong ba sngas kyis/ bdag cag gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag gi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ngo snyam mo de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gzhan
131b1('dul ba): mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag gi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do//
131b2('dul ba): de nas mu stegs can zhig gis mu stegs can dag la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag bdag cag 'ba' zhig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang gso sbyong yod dam/ 'on te shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la yang yod/ de nas mu stegs can zhig gis mu stegs can
131b3('dul ba): dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ / shes ldan dag bdag cag 'ba' zhig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang gso sbyong yod kyi/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la ni med do// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag gis smras pa la
131b4('dul ba): mngon par bstod par yang mi byed/ phyir ldog par yang mi byed cing mngon par bstod pa yang ma byas/ phyir bzlog par yang ma byas par stan dag las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
131b5('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ / mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gis gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag dang lhan cig bar skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol nas
131b6('dul ba): 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ / kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi la yang mchis pa dang / bgyi ba dang / gso sbyong bca' bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag la cang mi gsung bas
131b7('dul ba): gnang ngo / / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //
132a1('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad 'dug pa dang / bya ba dang / gso sbyong la tron bya bar rjes su gnang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin
132a2('dul ba): chad 'dug pa dang / bya ba dang / gso sbyong la tron bya bar rjes su gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis 'dug pa ci lta bu yin pa dang / bya ba ci lta bu yin pa dang / gso sbyong ci lta bu yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams
132a3('dul ba): kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed tshur shog/ 'dug pa ni rnal 'byor te/ lus 'di nyid rkang pa'i mthil yan chad klad pa'i skra man chad pags pa la thug gi bar du ji ltar gnas pa dang / ci ltar byas pa
132a4('dul ba): bzhin du mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ste/ lus 'di la skra dang kha spu dang / sen mo dang so dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / rus pa dang / rgyus pa dang / rtsa dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu
132a5('dul ba): ma dang / gnye ma dang / pho ba dang / long ka dang / lgang pa dang / mtsher pa dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / snabs dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang /
132a6('dul ba): gcin dag yod do snyam du so sor rtogs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag spyod yul du zhugs pa na yang rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa na de dag glang po che 'khrul pa dang / rta 'khrul pa dang / rkang thang pa 'khrul
132a7('dul ba): pa dang lhan cig phrad nas 'gyel ba dang bub par gyur nas ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag mi mthong ngam ci zhes co 'dri bar byed pa dang / de dag rnal 'byor sgom mo zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
132b1('dul ba): stsal pa/ spyod yul du zhugs pas rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o// de dag sgo khang du rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa na yur nas ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci khyed 'du bar nyal ba'i brtul zhugs can yin nam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge
132b2('dul ba): slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang du rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o// de dag khyams su sgom par byed pa na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyams su rnal 'byor bsgom par
132b3('dul ba): mi bya'o/ / de dag gnas khang du sgom par byed pa na bsam gtan dag gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyang mi thob pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang du rnal
132b4('dul ba): 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/ / de dag dgon par dong ste sgom par byed pa na chom rkun pa rnams dang / g.yon can rnams dang / seng ge rnams dang / stag rnams dang / gung rnams dang / gzig rnams kyis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge
132b5('dul ba): slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgon par rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o// de dag grong dang nye bar lhags nas sgom par byed pa na ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci khyed cag 'ga' zhig shi ba dang ldan par ma gyur tam zhes
132b6('dul ba): co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs de yal ga dag gam/ seg dag dang / re lde dag gis bskor bar bya'o// de dag gis phyogs yal ga dag gam/ seg
132b7('dul ba): dag gam/ re lde dag gis bskor ba dang ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci 'di rgyal mo ga gon gyi ra ba'am/ la phug gi ra ba'am zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
133a1('dul ba): phyogs de rtsig pa dag gam/ 'obs dag gis bskor bar bya'o// de dag gis phyogs de rtsig pa dag gam/ 'obs dag gis bskor ba dang / ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci 'di ma du lung ga'i ra ba'am/ 'on te bal po se'u'i ra ba
133a2('dul ba): yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ rnal 'byor sgom pa'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na spong khang brtsig par gnang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis spong khang
133a3('dul ba): brtsig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis spong khang rnam pa ji lta bu yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spong khang ni gnyis te/ chung ngu dang / chen po'o//
133a4('dul ba): chung ngu ni gnas khang gnyis kyi bar du srang btod pa'o// chen po ni gnas khang bcu'am/ bcu gnyis kyi bar du srang btod pa'o// dge slong dag gis gnas khang byas nas sbyang byed pa bzhin du sgo dod par mi byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo
133a5('dul ba): gdod par bya'o/ / dge slong dag sgo glegs mi 'dzud nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o// dbye dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag zungs gdags par bya'o// yang mig sgra 'khrol nas bcom ldan
133a6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tu ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o// gcad dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnam gzer dang / 'khor gtan dang / phred gtan gzhug par bya'o// mun gnag par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
133a7('dul ba): stsal pa/ skar khung gdod par bya'o// dma' bar btod pa na chom rkun pa dang / g.yon can dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / gung rnams kyis bgrod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dma' bar gdod par mi bya'o// mthon po gdod pa na snang
133b1('dul ba): ba mi gsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthon por gdod par mi bya bar sum gnyis dor bar bya zhing sum gnyis dor nas sum char gdod par bya'o// de dag gong du sum gnyis bor te 'og gi sum char dod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
133b2('dul ba): 'og tu sum gnyis bor te gong du sum cha bor bar gdod par bya'o// dge slong dag phyi yangs shing nang rub par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung rgya mtsho'i rnam pa lta bur gdod par bya ste/ phyi rub la nang yangs par bya'o// khwa dang / mchil
133b3('dul ba): pa dang / phug ron dag 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung dra ba can du bya'o// sbrang bu tre ma bu ka dang / tre la ta dag 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o// rlung gis 'byed nas bcom ldan
133b4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phred gtan gzhug par bya'o// gcad dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnam gzer dang 'khor gtan gzhug par bya'o// dbye dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyug gu skam ka byas te phred
133b5('dul ba): gtan dang / gnam gzer dang / 'khor gtan dag gis ni gcad par bya'o// dbyug gu skam kas ni dbye bar bya'o// der stan dgos par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa'i stegs bu dag bya'o// mkhrang bar gyur nas bcom ldan
133b6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khri'u bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis khri'u bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis khri'u ci 'dra ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kho ra khor yug tu khru bzhis 'khor ba'i khri'u bya zhing de thags mas bla bar
133b7('dul ba): bya'o/ / de dag gis thags ma du yod mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thags ma ni lnga ste/ mun dza'i dang / sha na'i dang / gres ma'i dang / ras ma'i dang / sba phra mo'i'o// de dag mkhrang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
134a1('dul ba): stan nang tshangs can gding bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis stan nang tshangs can dag gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis stan nang tshangs can ci 'dra ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid du khru bzhi pa zheng
134a2('dul ba): du khru do yod pa nyis ltab tu byas te drub par bya'o/ / de'i nang du shing bal gyis dgang bar bya'o// de dag gis shing bal du yod mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing bal dag ni lnga ste/ arga'i shing bal dang / ka shi ka'i shing bal dang / er
134a3('dul ba): ka'i shing bal dang / spra ba'i shing bal dang / shal ma li'i shing bal dag yin no// gzhan yang lnga ste/ bal dang / sha na'i shing bal dang / ras bal dang / ras ma dang / lo ma'i tshogs dag gis bkang ba dag yin no// shing bal thams cad phyogs
134a4('dul ba): gcig tu 'chugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo mdor skud pas bya rog rkang gi gzungs gdab par bya'o// 'khod pa na yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gdos bu gdags par bya'o// ji ltar gdags mi shes nas bcom ldan
134a5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skud pa btags te rna ba la gdags par bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyug gu gzugs par bya'o// dge slong dag dbyug gu smyig gu'i bcad 'phro lta bus 'dzugs pa na rma byung nas bcom ldan 'das
134a6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bre'i bcad 'phro lta bur bya'o// 'on kyang snad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras ma dag gis dkris nas dal bus khad kyis khad kyis gzugs par bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pho long
134a7('dul ba): 'phang bar bya'o/ / dge slong dag gis mun khung du 'phangs pa na de 'khyams nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thag gus btags te 'phang bar bya zhing de nas yang phyir drang bar bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdun du
134b1('dul ba): mar me gzhag par bya'o/ / 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa gcig brkyang bar bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa ya gcig kyang brkyang bar bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das
134b2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ langs te bcag par bya'o// dge slong dag 'chag pa na 'thom nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phred dag la 'ju bar bya'o// lag pas chang rgyud byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbu bu bskon la skud pas
134b3('dul ba): btags pa la 'jus te bcag par bya'o/ / mchil lham dang bcas pas 'chag par byed pa na sgra byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchil lham can gyis bcag par mi bya'o// rdul gyis rkang pa gnyis ma rung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
134b4('dul ba): pa/ par thang gding bar bya'o// snums par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgongs spong ba pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong spong ba pas zhag gsum zhing gsum zhing rkang pa gnyis bsku bar bya'o// dge slong
134b5('dul ba): spong ba pas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / de dag der mi shong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng du rim khang gnyis pa bya'o// 'dzeg dka' nas bcom ldan 'das
134b6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ them skas bya'o// lhung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o// de 'khrul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab par bya'o// 'on kyang mi shong
134b7('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi rol du spong khang chen po bya'o// de dag sgo sprod dag tu byed pa na de dag phan tshun dag tu snang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo snol mar gdod par bya'o// sgo khang bya'o// phug kyang bya'o// de dag de na yur
135a1('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo drung du snam bu'am ras dpyangs te nyal bar bya zhing 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de dag de nas song zhing yang phyis 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa bsko
135a2('dul ba): bar bya'o/ / dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / spong ba
135a3('dul ba): la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa mi shes pa ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya'o// dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos
135a4('dul ba): pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / spong ba la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa shes pa ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga po de dag dang
135a5('dul ba): ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya'o// 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/ je dang por spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta byed par spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te spro na des spro zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i
135a6('dul ba): 'og tu des gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol pa byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
135a7('dul ba): gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko ste/
135b1('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge slong
135b2('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing / dge slong ming 'di
135b3('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bskos
135b4('dul ba): shing / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid de/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge slong dag ngas dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas
135b5('dul ba): spong khang du chag chag gdab par bya'o/ / phyag dar bya'o// lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o// stan bsham par bya'o// bshang ba'i sa dang gci ba'i sa byi dor bya'o// chag chag gdab par bya'o// phyag dar bya'o// lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o// lo ma'i
135b6('dul ba): chang bu gzhag par bya'o/ / bong rdog dang / sa dang / chu gzhag par bya'o// de dag re re'i gan du song ste 'bod par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re re nas bod par mi bya bar gaN+DI brdung bar bya'o// des gaN+DI rgya cher brdungs pa dang ji tsam na spyod yul gyi grong mi rnams chom rkun pa ma
135b7('dul ba): 'ongs sam zhes sngangs nas/ de rnams go bgos te lhags nas 'phags pa dag ci chom rkun pa dag mchis sam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag chom rkun pa dag ma lhags te/ 'di ltar spong ba la tron byed do// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag rnam par 'tshe ba la
136a1('dul ba): tron mdzad kyi/ 'di na spong ba ga la mchis zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gaN+DI rgya cher brdung bar mi bya ste/ 'di ltar gaN+DI de ni lnga ste/ dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN+DI dang /
136a2('dul ba): las kyi gaN+DI dang / shi ba'i gaN+DI dang / spong ba'i gaN+DI dang / gnod pa byung ba'i gaN+DI 'o// de la dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN+DI de ni rgyud gsum dang tog gsum mo// las kyi gaN+DI de ni rgyud gcig dang tog gsum mo// shi ba'i gaN+DI de ni byi bo'o// spong ba'i gaN+DI de ni khar
136a3('dul ba): sil lo/ / gnod pa byung ba'i gaN+DI de ni ji tsam gyis chog pa'o// de dag dus rting la thug pa na ci bder byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rting la thug na ci bder mi bya bar dus shes par byas nas ci bder byas te/ dge 'dun las 'tshal ma thob pa gang dag yin
136a4('dul ba): pa de dag kyang khrus byas nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du khom pa dang / bsod snyoms pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rkang lag gnyis bkrus nas grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug khom par bya'o// de dag de kho na bzhin du ci bder byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
136a5('dul ba): kho na bzhin du ci bder mi bya bar rgyud chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o/ / de dag ha cang mang du 'don par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang mang du gdon par mi bya'o// de dag ha cang nyung ngur 'don par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha
136a6('dul ba): cang nyung ngur gdon par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar ran par gdon par bya'o// de dag yon bshad par mi byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis sus yon bshad
136a7('dul ba): par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad par bya'o// de dag yon bshad pa ha cang mang du byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad pa ha cang mang du mi bya'o// de dag yon bshad pa ha cang
136b1('dul ba): nyung ngur byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad pa ha cang nyung ngur mi bya ste/ 'di ltar yon bshad par ran par bya'o// dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu 'du zhing thams cad kyi mdun du dgyes par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
136b2('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu dgyes par bya zhing thams cad kyi mdun du 'du bar bya'o// gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na des phyogs dben par lde mig sbas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bos phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu lde mig sbas kyis phye la zhugs shig
136b3('dul ba): ces brjod par bya'o/ / dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de ni 'dug pa zhes bya'o// bya ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang /
136b4('dul ba): gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de 'di ni bya ba zhes bya'o// gso sbyong gang zhe na/ dge slong dag ngas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de khyed kyis deng phyin chad zla ba phyed phyed cing gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so
136b5('dul ba): sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis sus gdon par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan
136b6('dul ba): 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag de'i gnas khang du 'du bar byed pa na de dag der mi shong ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa
136b7('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang du gdon par mi bya'o// de dag khyams su gdon par byed pa na der yang mi shong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
137a1('dul ba): kyis dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis gang la blo mthun par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ byas pa'am/ zin pa nang mtshams dang
137a2('dul ba): phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa dge 'dun gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dod pa gang yin pa de la blo mthun par bya'o/ / 'di ltar blo mthun par bya ste/ gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/
137a3('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang
137a4('dul ba): dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye
137a5('dul ba): 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la/ dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang
137a6('dul ba): mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun
137a7('dul ba): gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi bar bzod pa
137b1('dul ba): de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge
137b2('dul ba): 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyis lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang du dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par byas pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye dang / gsol ba dang /
137b3('dul ba): gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ sdom la/ ka pi na dang chos gos dang // dgrol dang mtshams chung mtshams chen dang //
137b4('dul ba): gnang dang bskyung bskyed dgrol ba dang // gcad dang mi 'bral ma gcad dang // grong dgon las dang dgon pa yi// sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe
137b5('dul ba): na tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na rgyal po'i khab na sde can ma'i phug na gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas dge 'dun dang mthun par 'jug go/ / de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gso sbyong lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing mthun par gyur nas/
137b6('dul ba): shas cher tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na la sdod cing 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na 'di snyam du sems te/ deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong lnga pa yin la bdag dge slong ka pi na'i gso sbyong yang lnga pa yin na/ ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su
137b7('dul ba): 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro
138a1('dul ba): bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi
138a2('dul ba): bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / rtag tu dag pa snying po ste// rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin// gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa// de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal
138a3('dul ba): pas bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs su chud nas 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar mdzad de sde can ma'i phug tu tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na'i mdun
138a4('dul ba): du bzhugs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / ka pi na khyod gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag 'jog pa na 'di snyam du deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong lnga pa yin la bdag dge slong ka pi na'i gso sbyong yang lnga pa yin na/ ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas
138a5('dul ba): su 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun
138a6('dul ba): gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi
138a7('dul ba): bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / rtag tu dag pa snying po ste// rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin// gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa// de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal pas bdag
138b1('dul ba): ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam du sems la sems kyi yongs su rtog pa ma byung ngam/ btsun pa byung ngo // ka pi na khyod re zhig dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su mi 'gro na gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong
138b2('dul ba): bar mi byed na/ gzhan su zhig nyams su myong bar byed/ khyod dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro na gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi byed/
138b3('dul ba): na gzhan su zhig nyams su myong bar byed/ ka pi na de lta bas na khyod dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su mi 'gro bar ma byed par song shig/ ka pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong nyams su mi myong bar ma byed par nyams su myong bar byos shig/ ka pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi bya ba
138b4('dul ba): dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro bar ma byed par song shig/ ka pi na khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su mi myong bar ma byed par nyams su myong bar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
138b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na khrid nas gso sbyong gi gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas
138b6('dul ba): na dge slong dag gis gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po gcad pa rjes su gnang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar gcad
138b7('dul ba): par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i
139a1('dul ba): mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs
139a2('dul ba): su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o//
139a3('dul ba): de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs
139a4('dul ba): bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs
139a5('dul ba): pa'i mtshan ma brtan por brjod par bya'o/ / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan
139a6('dul ba): ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan por brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug
139a7('dul ba): mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni
139b1('dul ba): ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun
139b2('dul ba): gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du dge 'dun gyis grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas
139b3('dul ba): mal la thug gi bar du mtshams chen po gcod do/ / 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs
139b4('dul ba): bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan
139b5('dul ba): ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge
139b6('dul ba): slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas
139b7('dul ba): kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
140a1('dul ba): gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par
140a2('dul ba): gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po bcad pa der dge
140a3('dul ba): slong rnams kyis 'dug ste/ gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams chos gos gsum thogs te nyin mo spyod du 'dong ba na skyo
140a4('dul ba): bar gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o// 'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal
140a5('dul ba): bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol pa byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/
140a6('dul ba): gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa las/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba
140a7('dul ba): la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol to/ / 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir
140b1('dul ba): dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos
140b2('dul ba): gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams la bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
140b3('dul ba): ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal
140b4('dul ba): lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der dge slong rnams stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pas
140b5('dul ba): 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong dag la bzhi'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag byung zhing lnga'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag dang / bcu'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag byung nas/ de dag dge 'dun thams cad sdud par byed pa na/ dge slong rnams kyi dge
140b6('dul ba): ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams bu chung gcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bya'o// 'di ltar gcad par bya ste/ je dang
140b7('dul ba): por mtshams chen po dgrol bar bya'o/ / 'di ltar dgrol bar bya ste/ gnas mal bsham par byas nas/ gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig
141a1('dul ba): gis gsol ba byas te/ las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod
141a2('dul ba): na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso
141a3('dul ba): sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang
141a4('dul ba): dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po bshig cing bkrol lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du
141a5('dul ba): 'dzin to/ / de'i 'og tu dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
141a6('dul ba): brtan po gzugs par bya'o/ / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham
141a7('dul ba): pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su
141b1('dul ba): ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/
141b2('dul ba): rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar
141b3('dul ba): gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/ lho phyogs su ni srad bu bres pa lags/ nub phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/ byang phyogs su ni srol btod pa brtan po
141b4('dul ba): lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung
141b5('dul ba): gcod cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad do/ / 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i
141b6('dul ba): mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/ lho phyogs su ni srad bu bres pa lags/ nub phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/ byang phyogs su ni srol btod pa brtan po lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di
141b7('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu
142a1('dul ba): ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod
142a2('dul ba): cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di ltar gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams la bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin
142a3('dul ba): du 'dzin to/ / de'i 'og tu mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o// 'di ltar gcad par bya ste/ je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig
142a4('dul ba): pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub
142a5('dul ba): phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs
142a6('dul ba): pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar
142a7('dul ba): gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam
142b1('dul ba): po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/
142b2('dul ba): ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
142b3('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan
142b4('dul ba): ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na/ gal te dge
142b5('dul ba): 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong
142b6('dul ba): dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas
142b7('dul ba): pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/
143a1('dul ba): nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du
143a2('dul ba): gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod na/ tshe
143a3('dul ba): dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal
143a4('dul ba): la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/
143a5('dul ba): gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin
143a6('dul ba): du 'dzin to/ / dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po bcad pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug ste gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
143a7('dul ba): ro/ / de'i 'og tu mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o// 'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/
143b1('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa
143b2('dul ba): las/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos
143b3('dul ba): gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol to/ / 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po
143b4('dul ba): bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'di
143b5('dul ba): lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa
143b6('dul ba): de dag ni gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun gyis
143b7('dul ba): gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der dge slong rnams kyi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
144a1('dul ba): dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa las bgyid pa gcig gis gsol ba gcig dang las brjod pa gcig gis mtshams kyi sgo nang dang / slad rol dang bcas pa bskyung ba dang bskyed par rung ngam/ nye ba 'khor rung ste/ de la bskyung ba ni
144a2('dul ba): 'di yin te chung ngu'o/ / de la bskyed pa ni 'di yin te chen po'o// 'di ltar bya ste/ je dang por mtshams chen po dgrol bar bya zhing mtshams bu chung yang dgrol bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor ba gzhig par bya'o// 'di ltar dgrol bar bya ste/ gnas mal bsham
144a3('dul ba): pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na mtshams gnyi gar dge 'dun bkod de/ dge slong las byed pas mtshams gnyi gar shing ngam/ dbyug pa'am/
144a4('dul ba): seg gam/ re ldes mnan nas gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung bcad de dkyil 'khor
144a5('dul ba): bar blo mthun par bgyis pa las/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang gzhig ste/ dkyil 'khor ba dgrol bar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol
144a6('dul ba): ba'o/ / las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de/ dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bgyis pa
144a7('dul ba): de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang gzhig ste/ dkyil 'khor ba dgrol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang gzhig ste/ dkyil 'khor ba dgrol bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
144b1('dul ba): gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang bshig nas dkyil
144b2('dul ba): 'khor ba bkrol lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de'i 'og tu dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gis mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i
144b3('dul ba): mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
144b4('dul ba): dang / byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan
144b5('dul ba): ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/ / mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o//
144b6('dul ba): lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs
144b7('dul ba): te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/
145a1('dul ba): rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang /
145a2('dul ba): nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan
145a3('dul ba): ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/ / mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang /
145a4('dul ba): nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu mtshams gnyi gar dge 'dun bkod de dge slong las byed pas mtshams
145a5('dul ba): gnyi gar shing ngam/ dbyug pa'am/ seg gam/ re ldes mnan nas gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i
145a6('dul ba): mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma
145a7('dul ba): brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/ lho phyogs su ni srad bu bres pa
145b1('dul ba): lags/ nub phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/ byang phyogs su ni srol btod pa brtan po lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i
145b2('dul ba): gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu
145b3('dul ba): chung yang bcad de/ dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad de/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams
145b4('dul ba): chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/
